author: kayyagari
msg: o added a set to hold the pwdpolicy state OP ATs to be accessible from the BaseInterceptor
o updated OperationalAttributeInterceptor and SchemaInterceptor to use this set to restrict the modify operation on these attributes by users

author: kayyagari
msg: o added checks to not use the credentialCache when password policy is enabled
(when pwdpolicy is enabled, we need to fetch the user entry with all OP ATs to perform the pwdpolicy state related checks)

author: jlmonteiro
msg: OPENEJB-1305: patch from Andy. Hook standalone shutdown process.

author: hwright
msg: Move the SVNAdmin.MessageReceiver interface to the ISVNAdmin interface, in
an effort to consolidate the interfaces together.

author: reto
msg: CLEREZZA-253: ckecking for graph-specific read permissions
